entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:11 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: NE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
